question: Show me chefs and servers who speak English.
sql_query1:
SELECT Staff.Name 
FROM Staff
WHERE (Staff.Role = "Chef" OR Staff.Role = "Server") AND Staff.Language = "English"
sql_query2:
SELECT Staff.Name 
FROM Staff
WHERE Staff.Role = "Chef" OR Staff.Role = "Server" AND Staff.Language = "English"
interpretation1: Which chefs speak English and which servers speak the same language?
interpretation2: Provide a list of all chefs and also provide a list of servers who speak English.
